info.title: FortiOS Monitor
info.description: REST API for configuring FortiOS objects and settings

get.summary:
List all active IPv4 routing table entries.
Access Group: netgrp.route-cfg

schema.title: IPv4 Routing Monitor
schema.description: List all active IPv4 routing table entries.

items.title: IPv4 Routing Monitor Entry
items.description: An IPv4 routing table entry.

ip_version.title: IP Version
ip_version.description: IP Version of this routing table entry (must be 4 for this API).

subtype.title: Subtype
subtype.description: Subtype of the routing table entry - only used when type is OSPF or OSPF6.

ip_mask.title: IP Mask
ip_mask.description: IP address and mask representing the subnet this routing table entry routes to.

distance.title: Administrative Distance
distance.description: Rating of how expensive this routing table entry is, based on distance traveled and other factors.

metric.title: Metric
metric.description: A calculated rating of how 'good' this routing table entry is.

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: A calculated priority of this IPv4 route.

vrf.title: Virtual Routing and Forwarding
vrf.description: ID of the virtual routing and forwarding table that this routing table entry is in.

gateway.title: Gateway
gateway.description: IP address of the gateway that traffic will be forwarded to.

non_rc_gateway.title: Non-Recursive Gateway
non_rc_gateway.description: IP address of the non-recursive gateway that traffic will be forwarded to.

interface.title: Interface
interface.description: Interface that this routing table entry goes through.

is_tunnel_route.title: Is Tunnel Route
is_tunnel_route.description: True if this is a tunnel route.

tunnel_parent.title: Tunnel Parent
tunnel_parent.description: Name of the interface that is the tunnel parent for this routing table entry.

install_date.title: Install Date
install_date.description: Timestamp of when the routing table entry was installed, in seconds. Only used for dynamic routing.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

non_rc_gateway.description: IP address of the non-recursive gateway that traffic will be forwarded to.

interface.title: Interface

is_tunnel_route.title: Is Tunnel Route
is_tunnel_route.description: True if this is a tunnel route.

tunnel_parent.title: Tunnel Parent
tunnel_parent.description: Name of the interface that is the tunnel parent for this routing table entry.

install_date.title: Install Date
install_date.description: Timestamp of when the routing table entry was installed, in seconds. Only used for dynamic routing.

vrf.title: Virtual Routing and Forwarding
vrf.description: ID of the virtual routing and forwarding table that this routing table entry is in.

items.title: BGP Paths Routing Monitor Entry
items.description: BGP paths routing table entry.

nlri_prefix.description: Route address prefix learned from NLRI.

nlri_prefix_len.description: Route address prefix length learned from NLRI.

learned_from.title: Learned From
learned_from.description: Name of the peer this path was learned from.

next_hop.description: Next hop address for this path.

origin.title: Origin
origin.description: Origin of the learned path, igp, egp or incomplete.

is_best.title: Best Path
is_best.description: True when this entry is the best path.

get.summary:
Retrieve a list of active IPv4 policy routes.
Access Group: netgrp.route-cfg

items.title: Policy Route
items.description: Details for a policy route.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: True when the policy route is enabled.

action.title: Action
action.description: Action to take when traffic matches the policy route.

negate_source.title: Negate Source
negate_source.description: True when negate source address match is enabled.

negate_destination.title: Negate Destination
negate_destination.description: True when negate destination address match is enabled.

protocol.title: Protocol Number
protocol.description: IP protocol number. 0 means all protocols.

type_of_service.title: Type of Service
type_of_service.description: Matching rules for the ToS field of the IPv4 header.

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description: ToS bit pattern. The format is 0xff.

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: ToS bits to evaluate. The format is 0xff.

src_interfaces.title: Source Interfaces
src_interfaces.description: A list of source interface names.

items.title: Source Interface
items.description: A source interface for this route.

dst_interfaces.title: Destination Interfaces
dst_interfaces.description: A list of destination interface names.

items.title: Destination Interface
items.description: A destination interface for this route.

dst_phy_interfaces.title: Destination Physical Interfaces
dst_phy_interfaces.description: A list of destination physical/parent interface names.

items.title: Destination Physical Interface
items.description: A destination physical/parent interface for this route.

gateway.title: Gateway
gateway.description: A map associating outgoing interface names to their gateway address.

additionalProperties.title: Interface Gateway Association
additionalProperties.description: Each key is an outgoing interface name. Each value is the IPv4 gateway address associated with that interface.

from.title: Starting Port
from.description: Starting port of the port range.

to.title: Ending Port
to.description: Ending port of the port range.

dst_ports.title: Destination Port Ranges
dst_ports.description: A list of destination port ranges.

items.title: Destination Port Range
items.description: A range of destination ports for this route.

from.title: Starting Port
from.description: Starting port of the port range.

to.title: Ending Port
to.description: Ending port of the port range.

source_addresses.title: Source Address Ranges
source_addresses.description: A list of IPv4 source address ranges.

items.title: Source Address Range
items.description: A source address range for this route.

from.title: Starting Address
from.description: Starting IPv4 address of the address range.

to.title: Ending Address
to.description: Ending IPv4 address of the address range.

dst_addresses.title: Destination Address Ranges
dst_addresses.description: A list of IPv4 destination address ranges.

items.title: Destination Address Range
items.description: A destination address range for this route.

from.title: Starting Address
from.description: Starting IPv4 address of the address range.

to.title: Ending Address
to.description: Ending IPv4 address of the address range.

src_address_objects.title: Source Address FQDN Objects
src_address_objects.description: A list of FQDN source addresses.

items.title: Source Address FQDN Object
items.description: A source firewall FQDN address for this route.

id.title: FQDN Object ID
id.description: ID of the FQDN address object.

name.title: FQDN Object Name
name.description: Name of the FQDN address object.

dst_address_objects.title: Destination Address FQDN Objects
dst_address_objects.description: A list of FQDN destination addresses.

items.title: Destination Address FQDN Object
items.description: A destination firewall FQDN address for this route.

id.title: FQDN Object ID
id.description: ID of the FQDN address object.

name.title: FQDN Object Name
name.description: Name of the FQDN address object.

src_countries.title: Source Address Countries
src_countries.description: A list of source country addresses.

items.title: Source Address Country
items.description: A country address identifier for the source.

dst_countries.title: Destination Address Countries
dst_countries.description: A list of destination country addresses.

items.title: Destination Address Country
items.description: A destination county address.

src_wildcard.title: Source Wildcard Addresses
src_wildcard.description: A list of source IPv4 subnet addresses.

items.title: Source Wildcard Address
items.description: A source wildcard firewall address for this route.

dst_wildcard.title: Destination Wildcard Addresses
dst_wildcard.description: A list of destination IPv4 subnet addresses.

items.title: Destination Wildcard Address
items.description: A destination wildcard firewall address for this route.

internet_services.title: Destination Internet Services
internet_services.description: A list of destination internet services.

items.title: Destination Internet Service
items.description: A destination internet service for this route.

application_controls.title: Destination Application Controls
application_controls.description: A list of destination application controls.

items.title: Application Control
items.description: An application control.

category.title: Category
category.description: The category that the application belongs to. This only applies when the application control type is "application".

user_groups.title: User Groups
user_groups.description: User groups for source address matching. Only used for SD-WAN rules.

items.title: User Group
items.description: A user group for source address matching.

is_static_route.title: Static Route
is_static_route.description: True when this policy route is created by a static route. Static routes based on internet service will provision a policy route.

static_route_id.title: Static Route ID
static_route_id.description: The ID of the static route that created this policy route.

is_vwl_route.title: SD-WAN Route
is_vwl_route.description: True when this policy route is created by a SD-WAN rule.

vwl_rule.title: SD-WAN Rule
vwl_rule.description: The SD-WAN rule that created this policy route.

last_used.title: Last Used
last_used.description: Timestamp of when the policy route was last used.

hit_count.title: Hit Count
hit_count.description: Number of times the policy route has been used.

anyOf.title: IPv4 Policy Routes Count
anyOf.description: If the parameter count_only is set to true, the total number of policy routes will be returned instead.

count.title: Count
count.description: The number of IPv4 policy routes.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: count_only
parameters.description: Returns the number of IPv4 policy routes only.

get.summary:
Retrieve a list of active IPv6 policy routes.
Access Group: netgrp.route-cfg

items.title: IPv6 Policy Route
items.description: Details for an IPv6 policy route.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: True when the policy route is enabled.

protocol.title: Protocol Number
protocol.description: IP protocol number. 0 means all protocols.

type_of_service.title: Type of Service
type_of_service.description: Matching rules for the ToS field of the IPv6 header.

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description: ToS bit pattern. The format is 0xff.

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: ToS bits to evaluate. The format is 0xff.

srcintf.title: Source Interfaces
srcintf.description: A list of source interface names.

items.title: Source Interface
items.description: A source interface for this route.

negate_source.title: Negate Source
negate_source.description: True when negate source address match is enabled.

negate_destination.title: Negate Destination
negate_destination.description: True when negate destination address match is enabled.

src_address_objects.title: Source Address FQDN Objects
src_address_objects.description: A list of FQDN source addresses.

items.title: Source Address FQDN Object
items.description: A source firewall FQDN address for this route.

id.title: FQDN Object ID
id.description: ID of the FQDN address object.

name.title: FQDN Object Name
name.description: Name of the FQDN address object.

dst_address_objects.title: Destination Address FQDN Objects
dst_address_objects.description: A list of FQDN destination addresses.

src_countries.description: A list of source country addresses.

items.description: A country address identifier for the source.

dst_countries.description: A list of destination country addresses.

items.description: A destination county address.

src_wildcard.title: Source Wildcard Addresses
src_wildcard.description: A list of source IPv4 subnet addresses.

items.description: A source wildcard firewall address for this route.

dst_wildcard.title: Destination Wildcard Addresses
dst_wildcard.description: A list of destination IPv4 subnet addresses.

items.title: Destination Wildcard Address
items.description: A destination wildcard firewall address for this route.

dstintf.title: Destination Interfaces
dstintf.description: A list of destination interface names.

items.title: Destination Interface
items.description: A destination interface for this route.

dst_phy_interfaces.title: Destination Physical Interfaces
dst_phy_interfaces.description: A list of destination physical/parent interface names.

items.title: Destination Physical Interface
items.description: A destination physical/parent interface for this route.

gateway.title: Gateway
gateway.description: A map associating outgoing interface names to their gateway address.

additionalProperties.title: Interface Gateway Association
additionalProperties.description: Each key is an outgoing interface name. Each value is the IPv6 gateway address associated with that interface.

from.title: Starting Port
from.description: Starting port of the port range.

to.title: Ending Port
to.description: Ending port of the port range.

items.title: Source Address
items.description: A source firewall address for this route.

items.title: Destination Address
items.description: A destination firewall address for this route.

is_vwl_route.title: SD-WAN Route
is_vwl_route.description: True when this policy route is created by an SD-WAN rule.

vwl_rule.title: SD-WAN Rule
vwl_rule.description: The SD-WAN rule that created this policy route.

last_used.title: Last Used
last_used.description: Timestamp of when the policy route was last used.

hit_count.title: Hit Count
hit_count.description: Number of times the policy route has been used.

anyOf.title: IPv6 Policy Routes Count
anyOf.description: If the parameter count_only is set to true, the total number of policy routes will be returned instead.

count.title: Count
count.description: The number of IPv6 policy routes.
